column5: Anyone in the London area know of a place that I can get headliner in my 1987 Buick Grand National replaced. I tried googling with little results......thanks in advance
These  two shops that have been recommended to me and I've used both.    No clue if they have what you need though.  http://www.tommysmotors.com/ http://www.davecollverautocare.com/

No offence to adempsey but both of those shops are automotive repair facilities; like myself. Good shops but they don't do upholstery Dixie auto trim has a very long standing reputation for quality work; but they do know how to charge for their services.  Dan.
